file.name: 002_Extending_OAS_Definition_to_apply_CORS_to_an_API.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Weather
  description: Application to know about weather and forecast of a given city
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  contact:
    email: vimukthim@wso2.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5
- url: http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5
tags:
- name: weather
  description: Todayas Weather
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more
    url: https://openweathermap.org/current
- name: forecast
  description: wether forcast of the cities
  externalDocs:
    description: Find out more about our store
    url: https://openweathermap.org/forecast16
paths:
  /weather:
    get:
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: ID of the City
        schema:
          type: number
      - name: q
        in: query
        description: Name of the city
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Wether of The Given City ID
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Invalid API key. Please see http://openweathermap.org/faq#error401
            for more info
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Unable to find the URL path
          content: {}
        429:
          description: Your account is temporary blocked due to exceeding of requests
            limitation of your subscription type.
          content: {}
      x-auth-type: Application & Application User
      x-throttling-tier: 50KPerMin
  /forecast:
    get:
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: ID of the City
        schema:
          type: number
      - name: q
        in: query
        description: Name of the city
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Fore Cast of the Given city
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Invalid API key. Please see http://openweathermap.org/faq#error401
            for more info
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Unable to find the URL path
          content: {}
        429:
          description: Your account is temporary blocked due to exceeding of requests
            limitation of your subscription type.
          content: {}
components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: appid
      in: header
